name: Slime Adventure 2 (itch)
description:
The slime returns!

But this time in 3D! Climb the mountain to find the only place you remember from your past, what will await you at the top.

Stronger then ever!

Sprint, Double jump and Dash your way to victory as fast as you can. but don't forget to keep an eye out for hidden collectibles!

Did you know?

Did you ever wanna know how often you jumped our dashed while playing a game? Well this game keeps count on a multitude of stats such as: your fastest clear time, how often you jumped, dashed and died.

Controls

Controls : (Keyboard / Xbox )

Walk = WASD / Left stick

Jump = Space / A  

Sprint = Shift / left or right trigger

Dash = Right mouse button / X
